title: Bloodline
description: Bloodline, book Five of the Royal Blood Chronicles is the continuing story of Katrina, the chose leader of the Five. It follows her on her journey along with her friends and family as the Protectors fight evil forces in order to protect all the peaceful races of the world, including humans. Just as the Protectors have successfully begun to build clans in America and start to move the Vampires to safety, evil again challenges them as Dark Vampires follow them to the new world. It seems every time one enemy is defeated another arises. Cain and Damien have asked Katrina for her help, but can she really trust either one of them? And now is there something that will make her choose once and for all between Damien and Quinn and change everything, forever.Bloodline, the fifth in the Royal Blood Chronicles series is full of the same, fast paced drama as the others. The unexpected is once again the norm as it twists and turns around Katrina and the Protectors.Bloodline keeps you turning pages and pulls you into the 1880's with Elizabeth Loraine's descriptive writing style. It is a fantastic edition to the Chronicles.
author: Elizabeth Loraine
